title: Patch Notes
content: ssed condition was removed using the Protection from Evil and Good spell. Fixed an issue that would sometimes cause Zanner Toobin to just stand in the doorway to the Steel Watch Foundry if you walked out of the building while he was your follower. He will now always return to the office and wait for you to come back. Guess he likes it in there. Fixed a very rare bug where you could break up with your partner but still be unable to date Halsin.
